mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM db_publish pub LEFT JOIN sys_user u on pub.publishId=u.id WHERE 1=1 and pub.level=${level_code} and pub.column=${pub_col}

SELECT pub.id,pub.title,pub.type, u.name as "user.name" FROM db_publish pub LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = pub.publishId WHERE 1=1 and pub.level=${level_code} and pub.column=${pub_col} ORDER BY pubTime DESC limit ${offset},${size}
SELECT pub.*, u.name as "user.name" FROM db_publish pub LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.id = pub.publishId WHERE 1=1 and pub.id = ${pub_id}
